mapper.insert:
insert into doc_asn_header (asnno, asncreationtime, expectedarrivetime1, asnstatus, asntype, addtime, addwho, edittime, editwho, customerid, createsource, bytrace_flag, reserve_flag, warehouseid,
asnreference1,
asnreference2,
asnreference3,
asnreference4,
asnreference5,
notes,
userdefine1,
userdefine2,
userdefine3,
userdefine4,
userdefine5,
releasestatus, supplierid ) values(#{asnno}, now(), #{expectedarrivetime1}, '00', #{asntype}, now(), #{addwho}, now(), #{addwho}, #{customerid}, #{addwho}, 'N', 'N', #{warehouseid},
#{asnreference1},
#{asnreference2},
#{asnreference3},
#{asnreference4},
#{asnreference5},
#{notes},
#{userdefine1},
#{userdefine2},
#{userdefine3},
#{userdefine4},
#{userdefine5},
'Y', #{supplierid} )
mapper.update:
update Doc_Asn_Header set asntype=#{asntype}, releasestatus=#{releasestatus},
expectedarrivetime1=#{expectedarrivetime1},
notes=#{notes},
asnreference1=#{asnreference1},
asnreference2=#{asnreference2},
asnreference3=#{asnreference3},
asnreference4=#{asnreference4},
asnreference5=#{asnreference5},
edittime=now(), editwho=#{editwho} where asnno=#{asnno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update Doc_Asn_Header set
addtime=#{addtime},
addwho=#{addwho},
archiveflag=#{archiveflag},
asncreationtime=#{asncreationtime},
asnno=#{asnno},
asnreference1=#{asnreference1},
asnreference2=#{asnreference2},
asnreference3=#{asnreference3},
asnreference4=#{asnreference4},
asnreference5=#{asnreference5},
asnstatus=#{asnstatus},
asntype=#{asntype},
asn_print_flag=#{asnPrintFlag},
billingclass_group=#{billingclassGroup},
billingid=#{billingid},
billingname=#{billingname},
bytrace_flag=#{bytraceFlag},
b_address1=#{bAddress1},
b_address2=#{bAddress2},
b_address3=#{bAddress3},
b_address4=#{bAddress4},
b_city=#{bCity},
b_contact=#{bContact},
b_country=#{bCountry},
b_fax=#{bFax},
b_mail=#{bMail},
b_province=#{bProvince},
b_tel1=#{bTel1},
b_tel2=#{bTel2},
b_zip=#{bZip},
carrieraddress1=#{carrieraddress1},
carrieraddress2=#{carrieraddress2},
carrieraddress3=#{carrieraddress3},
carrieraddress4=#{carrieraddress4},
carriercity=#{carriercity},
carriercontact=#{carriercontact},
carriercountry=#{carriercountry},
carrierfax=#{carrierfax},
carrierid=#{carrierid},
carriermail=#{carriermail},
carriername=#{carriername},
carrierprovince=#{carrierprovince},
carriertel1=#{carriertel1},
carriertel2=#{carriertel2},
carrierzip=#{carrierzip},
countryofdestination=#{countryofdestination},
countryoforigin=#{countryoforigin},
createsource=#{createsource},
customerid=#{customerid},
deliveryterms=#{deliveryterms},
deliverytermsdescr=#{deliverytermsdescr},
deliveryvehicleno=#{deliveryvehicleno},
deliveryvehicletype=#{deliveryvehicletype},
door=#{door},
driver=#{driver},
edisendflag=#{edisendflag},
edisendtime=#{edisendtime},
edisendtime2=#{edisendtime2},
edisendtime3=#{edisendtime3},
edisendtime4=#{edisendtime4},
edisendtime5=#{edisendtime5},
edittime=#{edittime},
editwho=#{editwho},
expectedarrivetime1=#{expectedarrivetime1},
expectedarrivetime2=#{expectedarrivetime2},
followup=#{followup},
h_edi_01=#{hEdi01},
h_edi_02=#{hEdi02},
h_edi_03=#{hEdi03},
h_edi_04=#{hEdi04},
h_edi_05=#{hEdi05},
h_edi_06=#{hEdi06},
h_edi_07=#{hEdi07},
h_edi_08=#{hEdi08},
h_edi_09=#{hEdi09},
h_edi_10=#{hEdi10},
h_edi_11=#{hEdi11},
issuepartyid=#{issuepartyid},
issuepartyname=#{issuepartyname},
i_address1=#{iAddress1},
i_address2=#{iAddress2},
i_address3=#{iAddress3},
i_address4=#{iAddress4},
i_city=#{iCity},
i_contact=#{iContact},
i_country=#{iCountry},
i_fax=#{iFax},
i_mail=#{iMail},
i_province=#{iProvince},
i_tel1=#{iTel1},
i_tel2=#{iTel2},
i_zip=#{iZip},
lastreceivingtime=#{lastreceivingtime},
medicalxmltime=#{medicalxmltime},
notes=#{notes},
packmaterialconsume=#{packmaterialconsume},
paymentterms=#{paymentterms},
paymenttermsdescr=#{paymenttermsdescr},
placeofdelivery=#{placeofdelivery},
placeofdischarge=#{placeofdischarge},
placeofloading=#{placeofloading},
pono=#{pono},
priority=#{priority},
qcstatus=#{qcstatus},
receiveid=#{receiveid},
releasestatus=#{releasestatus},
reserve_flag=#{reserveFlag},
return_print_flag=#{returnPrintFlag},
serialnocatch=#{serialnocatch},
supplierid=#{supplierid},
supplier_address1=#{supplierAddress1},
supplier_address2=#{supplierAddress2},
supplier_address3=#{supplierAddress3},
supplier_address4=#{supplierAddress4},
supplier_city=#{supplierCity},
supplier_contact=#{supplierContact},
supplier_country=#{supplierCountry},
supplier_fax=#{supplierFax},
supplier_mail=#{supplierMail},
supplier_name=#{supplierName},
supplier_province=#{supplierProvince},
supplier_tel1=#{supplierTel1},
supplier_tel2=#{supplierTel2},
supplier_zip=#{supplierZip},
userdefine1=#{userdefine1},
userdefine2=#{userdefine2},
userdefine3=#{userdefine3},
userdefine4=#{userdefine4},
userdefine5=#{userdefine5},
userdefine6=#{userdefine6},
userdefinea=#{userdefinea},
userdefineb=#{userdefineb},
warehouseid=#{warehouseid},
zonegroup=#{zonegroup},
where asnno = #{asnno}
mapper.select: select sum(tr.FMQTY) as fmqty,sum(tr.FMQTY_EACH) fmqty_each from act_transaction_log tr,inv_lot_att lt,bas_sku bs where tr.FMLOTNUM = lt.lotnum and tr.FMSKU = bs.sku and tr.FMCUSTOMERID = bs.customerid and tr.transactiontype = 'IN' and tr.status = '99' and tr.docno = #{asnNo}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM doc_asn_header t_asn_h LEFT JOIN doc_asn_details t_asn_d ON t_asn_h.asnno = t_asn_d.asnno AND t_asn_d.asnlineno = 1 LEFT JOIN bas_sku t_sku ON t_sku.customerid = t_asn_d.customerid AND t_sku.sku = t_asn_d.sku LEFT JOIN product_line t_line ON t_line.product_line_id = t_sku.sku_group1
select count(1) from Doc_Asn_Details where asnno = #{condition.asnno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select code as asntype, codename_c as asntypeName from Bas_Codes where codeid = 'ASN_TYP' order by show_sequence
select code as asnstatus, codename_c as asnstatusName from Bas_Codes where codeid = 'ASN_STS' order by show_sequence
select code as releasestatus, codename_c as releasestatusName from Bas_Codes where codeid = 'RLS_STS' order by show_sequence

select
from doc_asn_header where asnstatus = '00' or asnstatus = '30' order by addtime desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}

select asnHeader.* from doc_asn_header asnHeader left join doc_pa_header paHeader on paHeader.asnno = asnHeader.asnno left join doc_qc_header qcHeader on qcHeader.pano = paHeader.pano where qcHeader.qcno = #{qcno};
select count(*) from doc_asn_header where asnreference1 = #{asnreference1};

select tr.DOCNO,tr.DOCLINENO,tr.FMSKU,lt.lotatt12,lt.lotatt06,bs.descr_c,lt.lotatt04,lt.lotatt05,lt.lotatt07,lt.lotatt01,lt.lotatt02,sum(tr.FMQTY) as fmqty,sum(tr.FMQTY_EACH) fmqty_each,tr.FMLOCATION,tr.ADDTIME,tr.ADDWHO from act_transaction_log tr,inv_lot_att lt,bas_sku bs where tr.FMLOTNUM = lt.lotnum and tr.FMSKU = bs.sku and tr.FMCUSTOMERID = bs.customerid and tr.transactiontype = 'IN' and tr.status = '99' and tr.docno = #{asnNo} group by tr.DOCNO,tr.DOCLINENO,tr.FMSKU,lt.lotatt12,lt.lotatt06,bs.descr_c,lt.lotatt04,lt.lotatt05,lt.lotatt07,lt.lotatt01,lt.lotatt02,tr.FMLOCATION,tr.ADDTIME,tr.ADDWHO
